selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform any necessary numeric calculations while analyzing the sales data.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute any numeric expressions required during the analysis of sales figures.

new_skill_specs.name: analyze_sales_data
new_skill_specs.purpose: To analyze sales data and count the number of items sold less than 5 units in at least one store.
inputs: A list of dictionaries where each dictionary represents a row in the table with keys as column headers and values as sales figures.
new_skill_specs.outputs: An integer representing the count of items sold less than 5 units in at least one store.
edge_cases: All items have sales greater than or equal to 5 in all stores.
Some items have missing sales data for one or more stores.

tests.input: [{'Item': 'Item 1', 'Store A': 3, 'Store B': 6, 'Store C': 7}, {'Item': 'Item 2', 'Store A': 5, 'Store B': 5, 'Store C': 5}, {'Item': 'Item 3', 'Store A': 2, 'Store B': 4, 'Store C': 6}]
[{'Item': 'Item 1', 'Store A': 6, 'Store B': 6, 'Store C': 6}, {'Item': 'Item 2', 'Store A': 5, 'Store B': 5, 'Store C': 5}]
